Technique: DOVETAIL (JOINT); WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB; PAINTED
Name: Greek papyrus
Description: This fragment of papyrus, which comes from El-Hiba (P. Hib.I 115) and which dates from the year 250 B.C. carries, on the verso, a summary of duties and takings from the taxing of farms.
